title: CringeShieldX : Defender Against Cringe Content
author: Nur Tasin
synopsis: CringeShieldX is a browser extension that filters out cringe-worthy YouTube content. Customize block lists, install via Tampermonkey, and enjoy cringe-free browsing.

title: Automating Blog Management with Blogger.js
author: Nur Tasin
synopsis: Automates blog index generation, Git commits, pushes, and server cache flushing for streamlined content management and deployment.
